text: “Umenewu ndi (ulemelero) umene Allah akuwasangalatsira akapolo Ake nkhani yabwino; amene akhulupirira ndi kuchita zabwino. Nena (iwe Mtumiki {s.a.w} kwa iwo): “Sindikupemphani malipiro (kapena chuma) pofikitsa uthenga (kwa inu), koma kuti musunge chikondi pachibale chimene chili pakati pathu. (Musandizunze kufikira ndifikitse kwa inu uthenga wa Mbuye wanga.)” Amene achita chabwino timuonjezera pachabwinocho ndithu Allah Ngokhululuka kwambiri, Ngolandira kuthokoza
